offences.title: Public service vehicle - passenger use altered / defaced   ticket
offences.standardoffencewording: On **(..SPECIFY DATE..) at **(..SPECIFY TOWNSHIP..), being a passenger on a vehicle, namely **(..SPECIFY VEHICLE MAKE AND INDEX NUMBER..), used    for the carriage of passengers at separate fares, used a ticket which had been altered or    defaced  .
offences.standardstatementoffacts: At **(..SPECIFY TIME..) on **(..SPECIFY DATE..) the defendant was a passenger on a public service vehicle, namely **(..SPECIFY VEHICLE MAKE AND INDEX NUMBER..), **(..SPECIFY BRIEF DETAILS OF ROUTE..) and used a ticket which had been altered or defaced in that **(..SPECIFY NATURE OF ALTERATION/DEFACEMENT..).
offences.legislation: Contrary to regulation 7(1)(a) of the Public Service Vehicles (Conduct of Drivers, Inspectors, Conductors and Passengers) Regulations 1990 and section 25 of the Public Passenger Vehicles Act 1981.

offences.title: Public service vehicle - passenger use ticket issued for another person
offences.standardoffencewording: On **(..SPECIFY DATE..) at **(..SPECIFY TOWNSHIP..), being a passenger on a vehicle, namely **(..SPECIFY VEHICLE MAKE AND INDEX NUMBER..), used    for the carriage of passengers at separate fares, used a ticket which had been issued for    use by another person on terms that it was not transferable.
offences.standardstatementoffacts: At **(..SPECIFY TIME..) on **(..SPECIFY DATE..) the defendant was a passenger on a public service vehicle, namely **(..SPECIFY VEHICLE MAKE AND INDEX NUMBER..), **(..SPECIFY BRIEF DETAILS OF ROUTE..) and used a ticket which had been issued to another person and was not transferable.
offences.legislation: Contrary to regulation 7(1)(b) of the Public Service Vehicles (Conduct of Drivers, Inspectors, Conductors and Passengers) Regulations 1990 and section 25 of the Public Passenger Vehicles Act 1981.
